- **Updated maven-compiler-plugin version**: 3.1 → 3.11.0
  - This newer version properly supports the `release` parameter for Java 17
  - Simplified compiler configuration to use only the `release` parameter instead of separate `source`, `target`, and `release` parameters
- **Removed redundant compiler properties**: 
  - Removed `maven.compiler.source`, `maven.compiler.target`, and `maven.compiler.release` from properties section
  - These are now configured directly in the maven-compiler-plugin configuration

### 2. Source Code Updates

#### a. `com.ibm.research.ai.ki.util/src/main/java/com/ibm/research/ai/ki/util/DenseVectors.java`
- **Fixed deprecated API usage**: 
  - Changed `new Double(corrValue).isNaN()` to `Double.isNaN(corrValue)`
  - The `Double(double)` constructor has been deprecated since Java 9 and removed in Java 17

#### b. `com.ibm.research.ai.ki.util/src/main/java/com/ibm/research/ai/ki/util/RandomUtil.java`
- **Fixed deprecated API usage**:
  - Changed `new Integer(i)` to `Integer.valueOf(i)` in the main method
  - The `Integer(int)` constructor has been deprecated since Java 9 and removed in Java 17

#### c. `com.ibm.research.ai.ki.util/src/main/java/com/ibm/research/ai/ki/util/NextOnlyIterator.java`
- **Removed deprecated finalize() method**:
  - The `finalize()` method has been deprecated since Java 9
  - The class already implements `AutoCloseable`, which is the recommended approach for resource cleanup
  - Removed the `finalize()` override that was calling `close()`

- 2 tests in nlp module
- No test failures or errors

- The migration maintains backward compatibility with existing functionality
- No changes to public APIs or behavior
